data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Read, Helen J., Enghoff, Henrik (2019): Siphonophoridae from Brazilian Amazonia. Part 2 - Two new treeclimbing species of the genus Siphonophora, including one showing pilosity polymorphism (Diplopoda, Siphonophorida). European Journal of Taxonomy 496: 1-26, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.496|19 occurrences
